attributes.action: guarantee that any member of Parliament found guilty of acting fraudulently should be sacked immediately.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: MPs and any other person in political office should be 'whiter than white'.  Fiddling expense claims, making dishonest mortgage applications, taking bribes and all similar dishonesty should be treated with extreme and immediate harshness. All persons found guilty of such activity should be removed from office and made subject to criminal proceedings.  The office of Prime Minister should not be excepted.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
